contentList.content: You are Planetouched, a mysterious being with appearance close to elves, but heritage far in the astral plane. You were born in a place where a meteor struck and your powers come from this strange occurence also.

You trace your heritage to the elves of Shadowfell who have been tainted by the negative energy from before Spellplague. Whether a blessing or a curse, your heart is cold and your soul ancient. You have skin of stone and listen intently whenever night falls to hear the whispers of your ancestor.

Your ancestry is tied to the Feywild and beings of Positive energy plane. You draw power from the burning radiance of a star being born, and you are driven by its intensity to explore and taste all the joys of life. Be careful not to burn before your time.
You can see in ordinary darkness up to a range of [1].
You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being Charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Embracing your astral ancestry you transform your body to become <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Nebulous_Form_Void">non-corporeal</LSTag> and the Negative energy stored within you retaliates upon melee attack.

Embracing your astral ancestry you transform your body to become <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Nebulous_Form_Comet">non-corporeal</LSTag> and the Positive energy stored within you retaliates upon melee attack.
You gain [1] and become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">resistant</LSTag> to melee attacks. Additionally any landing damage retaliates to deal [2] and [3] damage.
You summon your loyal companion <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Stelio_Passive">Stelio</LSTag>, who begrudgingly helps you on your journey through the Astral Sea and beyond.

A strange white raven that glimmers with unnatural magics. He's latched onto you and not even death can separate you. His witty quips border on malicous, but you've grown fond of him nonetheless. His origin is a mystery to you.
You call on the help of a star from deep within the Astral Sea to smite your enemy with a beam of energy.
